thread.title: Customer Matt Drummond
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by Customer Matt Drummond

author: Customer Matt Drummond
title: Customer Matt Drummond
text: The bags are top quality and look amazing on the bike... Very functional indeed... the turn signal kit and license plate kit on the other hand needs work... it took me 10 hours to take the entire bike apart and put this thing back together and still had to hire someone to do it properly... my suggestion is have a more plug and play type deal for this with pre assembled everything including the bullet lights and the proper extended cables with the clips for that bike... but I'm very happy with the outcome and over all product... well made and looks great
